page.title: 12SCHOOLS
page.content: The children in{KILMINGTON PRIMARY {SCHOOL}join children from other village schools in the area for some activities. This year we have been going to Musbury for sport and games activities with Musbury and Shute Primary Schools. We have also had a 4-day residential trip to Plymouth with Dalwood School, and have combined with other schools for a joint sports day and reorder-playing. {SHUTE PRIMARY SCHOOL There is also a primary school at Shute, the next village. The school is of similar size and organisation. {KILMINGTON PLAYGROUP A playgroup is run in the village hall every Monday morning for children of pre-school age. {SECONDARY SCHOOLS.} At 11, the children usually transfer to Axminster Secondary School or Colyton Grammar.
